item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses:

“You are to <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, ‘<st data-num="0376" class="">Any</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> from the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> (or <st data-num="04480" class="">any of</st> the <st data-num="01616" class="">resident foreigners</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01481" class="">live</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>) <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gives</st> any of his <st data-num="02233" class="">children</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="04432" class="">Molech</st><n id="3" /> must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>; the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> must <st data-num="07275" class="">pelt</st> him with <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>.<n id="4" />

I <st data-num="0589" class="">myself</st> will <st data-num="05414" class="">set</st> my <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st><n id="1" /> against <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> and <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> him <st data-num="03772" class="">off</st> from the <st data-num="07130" class="">midst</st> of his <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> he has <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> some of his <st data-num="02233" class="">children</st> to <st data-num="04432" class="">Molech</st> and <st data-num="04616" class="">thereby</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> my <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuary</st> and <st data-num="02490" class="">profaned</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, <st data-num="05956" class="">however</st>, the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="05956" class="">shut</st> their <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04480" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> when he <st data-num="05414" class="">gives</st> some of his <st data-num="02233" class="">children</st> to <st data-num="04432" class="">Molech</st> so that they do <st data-num="01115" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="04191" class="">to death</st>,

I myself will set my face against that man and his clan. I will cut off from the midst of the people both him and all who follow after him in spiritual prostitution, committing prostitution by worshiping Molech.
“‘The person who turns to the spirits of the dead and familiar spirits to commit prostitution by going after them, I will set my face against that person and cut him off from the midst of his people.
“‘You must sanctify yourselves and be holy, because I am the Lord your God.
You must be sure to obey my statutes. I am the Lord who sanctifies you.
“‘If anyone curses his father or mother, he must be put to death. He has cursed his father or mother; his blood guilt is on himself.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05003" class="">commits adultery</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,<n id="2" /> both the <st data-num="05003" class="">adulterer</st> and the <st data-num="05003" class="">adulteress</st> must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, he has <st data-num="01540" class="">exposed</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">Both</st> of them must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>; their <st data-num="01818" class="">blood guilt</st> is on themselves.<n id="3" />

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st> of them must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>. They have <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> <st data-num="08397" class="">perversion</st>;<n id="2" /> their <st data-num="01818" class="">blood guilt</st> is on themselves.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> <st data-num="04904" class="">as one goes to bed with</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of them have <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> an <st data-num="08441" class="">abomination</st>. They must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>; their <st data-num="01818" class="">blood guilt</st> is on themselves.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">has marital relations with</st> both a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> and her <st data-num="0517" class="">mother,</st><n id="1" /><st data-num="01931" class=""> it</st> is <st data-num="02154" class="">lewdness</st>.<n id="2" /> Both he and they must be <st data-num="08313" class="">burned</st> <st data-num="0784" class="">to death</st>,<n id="3" /> so there <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02154" class="">lewdness</st> in your <st data-num="08432" class="">midst</st>.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="05414 07903">has sexual relations</st><n id="1" /> with any <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st>, he must be <st data-num="04191 04191">put to death</st>, and you must <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> the <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st>.
If a woman approaches any animal to copulate with it, you must kill the woman, and the animal must be put to death; their blood guilt is on themselves.

“‘If a man has marital relations with his sister, whether the daughter of his father or of his mother, so that he sees her nakedness and she sees his nakedness, it is a disgrace. They must be cut off in the sight of the children of their people. He has exposed his sister’s nakedness; he will bear his punishment for iniquity.

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="01739" class="">menstruating</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> and <st data-num="01540" class="">uncovers</st> her <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st>, he has <st data-num="06168" class="">laid bare</st> her <st data-num="04726" class="">fountain</st> of blood, and <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> has <st data-num="01540" class="">exposed</st> the <st data-num="04726" class="">fountain</st> of her <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>, so <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st> of them<n id="2" /> must be <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> from the <st data-num="07130" class="">midst</st> of their <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st>.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01540" class="">expose</st> the <st data-num="06172" class="">nakedness</st> of your <st data-num="0517" class="">mother’s</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> or your <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> such a person has <st data-num="06168" class="">exposed</st> his own <st data-num="07607" class="">close relative</st>.<n id="1" /> They must <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> their <st data-num="05771" class="">punishment for iniquity</st>.<n id="2" />

If a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">goes to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="01733" class="">aunt</st>, he has <st data-num="01540" class="">exposed</st> his <st data-num="01730" class="">uncle’s</st> <st data-num="06172">nakedness</st>; they must <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> <st data-num="02399" class="">responsibility for</st> their <st data-num="02399" class="">sin</st>, they will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="06185" class="">childless</st>.
If a man has marital relations with his brother’s wife, it is indecency. He has exposed his brother’s nakedness; they will be childless.
“‘You must be sure to obey all my statutes and regulations, so that the land to which I am about to bring you to take up residence does not vomit you out.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">walk</st> in the <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st> of the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am about to <st data-num="07971" class="">drive out</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> you, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> they have <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these things</st> and I <st data-num="06973" class="">am filled with disgust</st> against them.

So I have said to you: You yourselves will possess their land and I myself will give it to you for a possession, a land flowing with milk and honey. I am the Lord your God who has set you apart from the other peoples.

Therefore you must <st data-num="0914" class="">distinguish</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st> and the <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>, and <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="05775" class="">bird</st> and the <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>, and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08262" class="">make</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="08262" class="">detestable</st> by means of an <st data-num="0929" class="">animal</st> or <st data-num="05775" class="">bird</st> or <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="07430" class="">creeps</st> on the <st data-num="0127" class="">ground</st>—<st data-num="0834" class="">creatures</st><n id="2" /> I have <st data-num="0914" class="">distinguished</st> for you as <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="3" />
You must be holy to me because I, the Lord, am holy, and I have set you apart from the other peoples to be mine.
“‘A man or woman who has in them a spirit of the dead or a familiar spirit must be put to death. They must pelt them with stones; their blood guilt is on themselves.’”
